summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City Light Department, authorizing the Superintendent of City Light to execute an amendment to the contract with the Bonneville Power Administration for the purchase and installation of monitoring equipment and specified reporting on the system utilizing heat rejected from major substation transformers at the Broad Street Substation, accepting and depositing contract funds in the Light Fund and increasing expenditure allowances in the 1984 Budget of City Light by appropriation from the Light Fund.
